document.full_text: the u.s. trade deficit narrowed unexpectedly in april, as u.s. exports rose to a new record and imports from japan tumbled more than 25 percent in the aftermath of its earthquake, tsunami and nuclear disaster, a u.s. government report showed on thursday.
document.title: trade gap narrows as japan imports tumble
lines_and_colors: the u.s. trade deficit narrowed unexpectedly in april, as u.s. exports rose to a new record and imports from japan tumbled more than 25 percent in the aftermath of its earthquake, tsunami and nuclear disaster, a u.s. government report showed on thursday.
